text: Logan Kari Williams (April 9, 2003 â€“ April 2, 2020) was a Canadian actor. He is best known for playing the young Barry Allen in the superhero series The Flash. He also starred as Miles Montgomery in the drama series When Calls the Heart. He had smaller roles in The Whispers and Supernatural. William was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. His mother was Swiss and his father was South African. On April 2, 2020, Williams died suddenly in Port Coquitlam, British Columbia. He was 16. He had struggled with an addiction to opioids prior to his death. == Related pages == * The Flash (2014 TV series) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2003 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian child actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors
title: Logan Williams
